item.title: APSB24-63: Security update available for Adobe Illustrator
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Illustrator. These updates resolve important vulnerabilities that could lead to memory corruption.
Products: Adobe Illustrator 2024, Adobe Illustrator 2023 Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/illustrator/apsb24-63.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
